definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: An abridgment of the book has been published for young readers.
sentences.chinese: 他们为年轻读者出版了这本书的节本。

sentences.english: This dictionary is an abridged edition.
This abridgment provides a concise presentation of this masterpiece of Buddhist literature.
sentences.chinese: 这个删节本提供了简明介绍佛教文学的杰作。

sentences.english: Pupils had better read its abbreviated version.
sentences.chinese: 小学生还是读该书的节本好。

sentences.english: It seems he gave an abridged version of his rules on how to win.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎接受了节本他的规则，就如何取胜。

definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

to make preparations for plowing and sowing
green pest prevention and control/environmentally friendly methods of pest control and prevention
pinyin: bing4 chong2 hai4 lu:4 se4 fang2 kong4

definition: major festival/important matter/major principle/high moral character
to protect young plants, ensuring that enough survive to produce a good crop
sowing in autumn (for a crop in spring)
